info.description: REST APIs for Azure Alerts Management Service.
info.title: Azure Alerts Management Service Resource Provider

get.description: List all operations available through Azure Alerts Management Resource Provider.

parameters.description: client API version
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: Lists the operations available in the AlertsManagement RP.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of alerts.

get.description: List all action rules of the subscription and given input filters

parameters.description: subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: filter by target resource group name
parameters.name: targetResourceGroup

parameters.description: filter by target resource type
parameters.name: targetResourceType

parameters.description: filter by target resource
parameters.name: targetResource

parameters.description: filter by severity
parameters.name: severity

parameters.description: filter by monitor service which is the source of the alert object.
parameters.name: monitorService

200.description: OK. Return the list of action rules

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of action rules

items.description: Action rule object containing target scope, conditions and suppression logic

properties.description: Action rule properties defining scope, conditions, suppression logic for action rule

conditions.description: Conditions in alert instance to be matched for a given action rule. Default value is all. Multiple values could be provided with comma separation.

alertRuleId.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

applicationInsightsSearchResults.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

description.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

logAnalyticsSearchResults.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

monitorCondition.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

monitorService.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

severity.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

signalType.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

targetResource.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

targetResourceGroup.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

targetResourceType.description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.description: list of values to match for a given condition.

createdAt.description: Creation time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

lastModifiedAt.description: Last updated time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group where action rule is stored

scope.description: Target scope for a given action rule. By default scope will be the subscription. User can also provide list of resource groups or list of resources from the scope subscription as well.

values.description: list of ARM IDs of the given scope type which will be the target of the given action rule.

status.description: Indicates if the given action rule is enabled or disabled

suppressionConfig.description: Suppression logic for a given action rule

recurrenceType.description: Specifies when the suppression should be applied

schedule.description: Schedule for a given suppression configuration.

recurrenceValues.description: Specifies the values for recurrence pattern

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get all action rule in a given subscription

get.description: List all the existing alerts, where the results can be selective by passing multiple filter parameters including time range and sorted on specific fields.

parameters.description: subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: filter by target resource
parameters.name: targetResource

parameters.description: filter by target resource group name
parameters.name: targetResourceGroup

parameters.description: filter by target resource type
parameters.name: targetResourceType

parameters.description: filter by monitor service which is the source of the alert object.
parameters.name: monitorService

parameters.description: filter by monitor condition which is the state of the alert at monitor service
parameters.name: monitorCondition

parameters.description: filter by severity
parameters.name: severity

parameters.description: filter by state
parameters.name: alertState

parameters.description: filter by smart Group Id
parameters.name: smartGroupId

parameters.description: include payload field content, default value is 'false'.
parameters.name: includePayload

parameters.description: number of items per page, default value is '25'.
parameters.name: pageCount

parameters.description: sort the query results by input field, default value is 'lastModifiedDateTime'.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: sort the query results order in either ascending or descending, default value is 'desc' for time fields and 'asc' for others.
parameters.name: sortOrder

parameters.description: filter by time range, default value is 1 day
parameters.name: timeRange

parameters.description: client API version
parameters.name: api-version

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of alerts.

items.description: An alert created in alert management service.

properties.description: An alert created in alert management service.

lastModifiedUserName.description: User who last modified the alert.

monitorCondition.description: Condition of the rule at the monitor service

monitorService.description: Monitor service which is the source of the alert object.

payload.description: More details which are contextual to the monitor service.

severity.description: Severity of alert Sev1 being highest and Sev3 being lowest.

signalType.description: Log based alert or metric based alert

smartGroupId.description: Unique Id of the smart group

smartGroupingReason.description: Reason for addition to a smart group

sourceCreatedId.description: Unique Id created by monitor service

targetResource.description: Target ARM resource, on which alert got created.

targetResourceGroup.description: Resource group of target ARM resource.

targetResourceName.description: Target ARM resource name, on which alert got created.

targetResourceType.description: Resource type of target ARM resource

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.smartGroupingReason: Alerts that frequently occur together have been grouped.
Alerts that frequently occur together have been grouped.

get.description: Get the history of the changes of an alert.

get.description: Summary of alerts with the count each severity.

parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: filter by target resource group name
parameters.name: targetResourceGroup

parameters.description: filter by time range, default value is 1 day
parameters.name: timeRange

parameters.description: client API version
parameters.name: api-version

properties.description: Summary of the alerts

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of results.

allOf.description: Summary of the alerts by monitor service
Summary of the alerts by severity and monitor condition
Summary of the alerts by monitor condition

sev0.description: Summary of alerts by monitor condition with severity 'Sev0'

allOf.description: Summary of the alerts by monitor condition

sev1.description: Summary of alerts by monitor condition with severity 'Sev1'

allOf.description: Summary of the alerts by monitor condition

sev2.description: Summary of alerts by monitor condition with severity 'Sev2'

allOf.description: Summary of the alerts by monitor condition

sev3.description: Summary of alerts by monitor condition with severity 'Sev3'

allOf.description: Summary of the alerts by monitor condition

sev4.description: Summary of alerts by monitor condition with severity 'Sev4'

summaryBySeverityAndMonitorCondition.description: Summary of alerts by severity and monitor condition

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the smartGroups within the specified subscription.

parameters.description: filter by target resource

parameters.description: number of items per page, default value is '25'.

parameters.description: sort the query results by input field, default value is 'lastModifiedDateTime'.

parameters.description: sort the query results order in either ascending or descending, default value is 'desc' for time fields and 'asc' for others.

200.description: OK. Returns list of all smartGroups.

schema.description: List of smart groups in value property.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of alerts.

items.description: Set of related alerts grouped together smartly by AMS.

properties.description: Properties of smart group.

alertSeverities.description: Summary of alertSeverities in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

alertStates.description: Summary of alertStates in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

alertsCount.description: Total number of alerts in smart group

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Last updated time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

monitorConditions.description: Summary of monitorConditions in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

monitorServices.description: Summary of monitorServices in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of alerts. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page alerts.

resourceGroups.description: Summary of target resource groups in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

resourceTypes.description: Summary of target resource types in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

resources.description: Summary of target resources in the smart group

count.description: Total number of items of type.

severity.description: Severity of smart group is the highest(Sev0 >... > Sev4) severity of all the alerts in the group.

startDateTime.description: Creation time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

alertId.description: Unique ID of an alert object.
alertId.name: alertId

alertsSortBy.description: sort the query results by input field, default value is 'lastModifiedDateTime'.
alertsSortBy.name: sortBy

includePayload.description: include payload field content, default value is 'false'.
includePayload.name: includePayload

monitorCondition.description: filter by monitor condition which is the state of the alert at monitor service
monitorCondition.name: monitorCondition

monitorService.description: filter by monitor service which is the source of the alert object.
monitorService.name: monitorService

pageCount.description: number of items per page, default value is '25'.
pageCount.name: pageCount

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name where the resource is created.
resourceGroup.name: resourceGroup

severity.description: filter by severity
severity.name: severity

smartGroupsSortBy.description: sort the query results by input field, default value is 'lastModifiedDateTime'.
smartGroupsSortBy.name: sortBy

sortOrder.description: sort the query results order in either ascending or descending, default value is 'desc' for time fields and 'asc' for others.
sortOrder.name: sortOrder

subscriptionId.description: subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId

targetResourceGroup.description: filter by target resource group name
targetResourceGroup.name: targetResourceGroup

timeRange.description: filter by time range, default value is 1 day
timeRange.name: timeRange
